content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Mary Smith from the United States of America. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in New York. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Mary Smith from the United States of America

content: Hello Mary, it's a pleasure to meet you. As the landlord of this apartment, I'm looking to maximize my gains, so I'm open to discussing the rental price with you. What is your proposed price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I would like to propose a price of 1500 Euros per month. I am willing to negotiate. Let me know what you think.

I would like to negotiate the price to the lowest possible. I want to be on good terms with my landlord.

I am dependable and responsible, and I would like to make sure that I can pay the rent on time every month.
name: Mary Smith from the United States of America

content:
Thank you for your proposal, Mary. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I'm afraid that I won't be able to accept your offer of 1500 Euros per month as it is lower than my minimum rental price for this apartment. However, I am open to discussing a mutually agreeable price.

In terms of your concern about being on good terms with me, I want to assure you that I am a fair and reasonable landlord. I understand that everyone has their own financial circumstances, and I am willing to work with you to find a rental price that works for both of us.

As for your payment history, I value dependability and responsibility in my tenants. I am confident that with your commitment to paying rent on time every month, we can establish a positive and long-term relationship.

Let's continue our negotiation and see if we can come to an agreement that works for both of us.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I understand your concerns, and I am willing to increase my offer to 1700 Euros per month. I hope we can agree on this price.

I am also willing to sign a lease agreement that clearly outlines the terms and conditions of our rental arrangement. This will ensure that both of us have a clear understanding of our responsibilities and obligations.

I am excited about the opportunity to rent this apartment and appreciate your willingness to work with me. Let's continue our negotiation and see if we can agree on a price that works for both of us.
name: Mary Smith from the United States of America

content:
Thank you for your counteroffer, Mary. I appreciate your willingness to increase your proposal, and I am happy to consider it.

I agree that a lease agreement is a good idea to establish clear terms and conditions of our rental arrangement. I am willing to work with you to draft a lease agreement that meets both our needs.

I am pleased to hear that you are excited about renting this apartment, and I am glad that you appreciate my willingness to work with you. Let's continue our negotiation and see if we can agree on a rental price that works for both of us.
name: Heinrich Heine
